00025 #define COUPLER_NAME_LENGTH     10
00026 
00028 typedef struct {
00030         unsigned char coupler_name[COUPLER_NAME_LENGTH];
00032         unsigned int fwd_scale_value[10]; //All HF bands + 6m
00034         unsigned int ref_scale_value[10];       //All HF bands + 6m
00036         unsigned int power_limit;
00037 } struct_coupler_settings;
00038 
00039 typedef struct {
00041         unsigned int led_fwd_power_high;
00043         unsigned int led_ref_power_high;
00045         unsigned int average_factor;
00047         unsigned int peak_level_time;
00049         unsigned char bargraph_mode;
00051         unsigned int vswr_warn_limit;
00054         unsigned int vswr_shutdown_limit;
00055 } struct_settings;
00056 
00057 typedef struct {
00059         unsigned int curr_fwd_ad_value;
00061         unsigned int curr_ref_ad_value;
00063         unsigned int curr_fwd_power;
00065         unsigned int curr_ref_power;
00067         double curr_vswr;
00068 } struct_status;
00069 
00070 struct_coupler_settings current_coupler;
00071 struct_status status;
00072 struct_settings settings;

00075 void input_calculate_power(void);
